attributes.action: Substantially reduce bank charges against customers who have overdrawn in their current account
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Considering that most bank customers are charged around £28 for being as little as £1 overdrawm on their current account, it's about time something was done given that the actual administration cost for banks is around £4.50!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
